Title: New Year's Season 3
Author: Carrie Rene
Summary: How do Lois and Clark spend New Year’s Eve in Season Three?

Title: Ficathon: Shake Your Love (for lovetvfan)
Author: Carrie Rene
Summary: What if the discussion in All Shook Up went a little differently when they arrived at his apartment?

Title: Ficathon: Kiss Me (for Carrie Rene)
Author: lovetvfan
Summary: Set right after their almost-first date, Lois finds herself in Smallville with Clark. She’s not sure why her partner felt it necessary to drag her there for a small town story about a library. She doesn’t know why it means so much to him. What she does know is that she desperately wants to finish what they started on their almost-first date and will follow him anywhere…even Smallville.

Title: Wish Straight From the Heart
Author: SuperBek
Summary: In this companion story to Wish Upon A Star and Wish Heard From Afar, young Jon Kent learns that his Christmas Eve wishes might have had more power than he’d imagined.

Title: Wish Heard From Afar
Author: SuperBek
Summary: In this companion story to Wish Upon A Star, Clark returns from New Krypton on Christmas morning to find an unexpected and precious gift.

Title: Savior
Author: SuperBek
Summary: As night falls on an old abandoned warehouse just outside Metropolis, Lois finds more than just a front-page story when she helps rescue a man who’s been imprisoned and subjected to unthinkable torture for nearly fifteen years. What will become of him as he’s thrown into a world he hasn’t seen since his too-short childhood? And how will Lois reconcile her complicated feelings for him as their friendship grows?

Title: New Year's Season 2
Author: Carrie Rene
Summary: How will Lois and Clark celebrate New Year’s Eve after their first Christmas spent together?

Title: Coffee With Clark
Author: KSaraSara
Summary: What if Lois had second thoughts about slamming the door in Clark’s face...right after she’d done it instead of the following night? Is there any way to un-slam a door? A Lucky Leon episode fix-it scene!

Title: New Year's Season 1
Author: Carrie Rene
Summary: What would have been like during New Year’s Eve in Season 1 between our favorite couple before they were a couple?

Title: Wish Upon A Star
Author: SuperBek
Summary: Lois and her son Jon make their annual Christmas wish. Will they finally receive the Christmas miracle they’ve been hoping for?

Title: Live To Fight Another Doomsday
Author: SuperBek
Summary: When the enemy seems insurmountable, all Clark needs to do is wake up and trust in…himself?

Title: Holiday Baking
Author: Carrie Rene
Summary: Lois’ attempt at baking during Season’s Greedings.  Ever wonder how Lois was going to make everything for dinner? With one little oven, how did she get everything done in time?

Title: Pencil It In
Author: SuperBek
Summary: Clark gets Lois a gift, but the gift has some unexpected consequences.

Title: Teacher’s Pet
Author: KSaraSara
Summary: Another sweet kid moment. Lois seems to be failing class. Clark is the teacher's pet. But don't worry, it's all worth it in the end.

Title: The New Adventures of Zooperman
Author: SuperBek
Summary: Lois and Clark spend an afternoon at the Metropolis Zoo.

Title: Safe In His Arms
Author: SuperBek
Summary: An event in Lois’s past throws a wrench into Lois and Clark’s wedding night plans.

Title: The Card
Author: Jerseygrl
Summary: At the end of Tempus Fugitive, right before they return to their time and their memories are wiped, Lois writes herself a note on the back of Perry’s birthday card so she won’t forget that Clark is Superman…

Title: Playing Pretend
Author: KSaraSara
Summary: Clark witnesses a sweet moment between Lois and their daughter.

Title: There Is No Such Thing As Magic
Author: bakasi

Title: Whisper of Hope
Author: SuperBek
Summary: After a rough day at school, Clark Kent overhears a conversation between his parents.

Title: I Ain't Worried
Author: Carrie Rene
Summary: Clark takes Lois on a date in late Season 2.  She sees it as a competition like usual, but he sees it as having a little fun.

Title: Anchor: Part 1 - Clark Kent
Author: SuperBek
Summary: A tragedy in another universe threatens all life on that universe’s Earth. Can Clark Kent AKA Superman save the world and set things back on the right path while finding a place for himself at the same time? An alternate universe story. Part 1 of 3.

Title: A Striking Revelation
Author: KSaraSara
Summary: It’s been a week since the Daily Planet party at the bowling alley. A private bowling lesson for Lois might just help uncover someone’s secret...

Title: Conned
Author: SuperBek
Summary: Clark can’t ever refuse Lois, even if it means...

Title: A Family Tradition
Author: lovetvfan
Summary: Set in the future, Lois attempts to untangle Christmas lights for the tree. Clark and the kids offer to help, but Lois is determined. After all, it’s her job to put up the lights. It’s a Lane family tradition.

Title: A Lucky Strike
Author: KSaraSara
Summary: As the events in Bowled Over continue, Lois' luck just keeps improving...enough that even she starts to wonder how she's playing so well.

Title: Head Games
Author: Carrie Rene
Summary: Lois tries to comfort Clark after Mayson’s death in Lucky Leon. Will he let Lois in on his secret? Or will he push her away even more?

Title: Bowled Over
Author: KSaraSara
Summary: Lois always claims that bowling isn't her game, but somehow, she always manages to win when Clark is around. Of course, Clark would probably say the same about himself.

Title: Spare A Smile For Me
Author: KSaraSara
Summary: Lois thinks this staff trip to the bowling alley is a waste of time, on top of already being in a bad mood. But when Clark delivers a little magic, it might just be enough to cheer her up.

Title: Federal Disaster
Author: lovetvfan
Summary: Lois and Clark are about to get married. Things have never been better. Except for one thing...Lois is terrified. All of her past intimate relationships have been, well...Federal Disasters. Before she can voice her fears to Clark, not one, but two of her past disasters come back to haunt her in ways she never could have expected. Throw in a threat against the President of the United States and it's just a typical day for Lois and Clark.

Title: Kiss Me
Author: SuperBek
Summary: A short revelation story in which Lois doesn’t quite react as expected to Superman’s confession.

Title: Lois . . .
Author: Blueowl
Summary: What if Clark had slightly different (better) priorities? Alternative ending to ‘And the Answer Is. . . .’

Title: Investigate: Keeper - 2nd Half
Author: Blueowl
Summary: Some people really should reevaluate the wisdom of traveling through time. Set in the Investigate Universe, serving as an interlude of sorts between Acts II and III.

Title: Drinks After Work
Author: KSaraSara
Summary: From the creator of Wherever You Will Go...In a world where Clark has stood her up for the last time...A mysterious phone call. An earth-shaking revelation. Beverages.

Title: Had It
Author: Blueowl
Summary: What if, when the assassin tried to get away by disguising himself as a beautiful blond and making a scene, Clark wasn't having it? Somewhat crackfic.

Title: Devil in Disguise
Author: Carrie Rene
Summary: What if Mindy Church threw a Halloween party and it took place in a known haunted resort?

Title: Her Own Path
Author: Toomi
Summary: Olivia, the only child of Lois and Clark, forges her own path.

Title: So Far Away
Author: KSaraSara
Summary: Clark finally made it back from New Krypton, but how can he ever hope to adjust to life back on Earth after everything that happened up there? Can he be the same man Lois fell in love with, be a father to Kallie...be Superman? Or will his own demons defeat him when everything he used to know seems so far away?

Title: Eyes Wide Open
Author: AnnieM
Summary: When Superman and Clark team up to keep Lois safe, undermining her current investigation, Lois is equally irritated with both the men in her life. And after a couple glasses of wine and a little time to vent, she's suddenly seeing things much more clearly.

Title: What the Heart Wants Part 2: The Magic of Love
Author: AnnieM and KathyB

Title: Footprint Hotel
Author: Blueowl
Summary: Muddy footprints on a ceiling. In answer to a challenge prompt: footprints on the ceiling.

Title: What the Heart Wants Part 1: Written in the Stars
Author: AnnieM and KathyB
Summary: When Pulitzer-prize winning reporter Lois Lane is asked to give a speech at a high school journalism convention, she never imagines that the request will change her life. But meeting high school English teacher Clark Kent, who is chaperoning his students at the convention, may just change her mind. Is a long distance relationship impossible to sustain? Or is it written in the stars?

Title: Clark Kent is a Dead Man
Author: Queen of the Capes

Title: This Is Not A Date
Author: KSaraSara
Summary: Celebrating her latest story success, Lois meets a handsome stranger in a bar, a stranger who has come to Metropolis to interview for his dream job. It's not a date...but could it be fate?

Title: Frankly My Dear, I Don't Like Pearl Jam
Author: lovetvfan and KSaraSara

Title: Because I Secretly Looked for Your Order
Author: KSaraSara
Summary: Lois holds grudges and Clark makes excuses, two indisputable facts. But when the two collide, will they find their way through to the other side? A story spawned from QueenoftheCapes' title generator.

Title: Impulse
Author: Blueowl
Summary: A Pheromone, My Lovely what if. What if Superman had been affected by the concentrated spray and Lois hadn't shown much resistance to his advances? Consequences abound. Can this severe misstep be put right or is their relationship over before it really began?

Title: There's A Fine, Fine Line  - Kerth Challenge #4
Author: Deadly Chakram
Summary: Lois’ inner thoughts after Clark dumps her “for her own good.”

Title: Open All Night - 2022 Kerth Challenge #4
Author: lovetvfan
Summary: The story leaves off from the scene in the car when Lois tries to confess her feelings for Clark, only in my version, he pretended to be asleep because he was so ashamed over not letting her think he was dead.

Title: Not Your Girl
Author: Toomi8
Summary: Set after season 2's 'Wall of Sound.' In the episode, Stokes makes the comment that Lois is Superman's 'girl.' Here's one way that ended...

Title: Terces is Secret Spelled Backwards - 2022 Kerth Challenge #6
Author: KSaraSara

Title: Investigate: Keeper - 1st Half
Author: Blueowl
Summary: Some people really should reevaluate the wisdom of traveling through time. Set in the Investigate Universe, serving as an interlude of sorts between Acts II and III.

Title: Bad Reputation
Author: Deadly Chakram
Summary: Not everyone cares to have a spotless reputation.

Title: At the Beginning With You Series
Author: KSaraSara and lovetvfan
Summary: Lois and Clark have some pretty painful conversations during Barbarians at the Planet. It seems like all they can do is hurt each other, and you can only wonder what’s going on in their heads as they’re taking turns breaking each others’ hearts. And what are they planning to do with all these feelings and all this hurt? This is Lois’ story.

Title: Rainfall
Author: Morgana
Summary: It has been a terrible week for Lois Lane, everything bad that could happen has happened.  What can partner Clark Kent do to cheer her up?  This takes place just before Lois starts dating Lex Luthor.  Let’s see if Clark’s simple friendly gesture during a storm and great timing keeps that awful misstep from happening.

Title: Pheromone, My Love
Author: KSaraSara
Summary: Clark may not have been affected by Miranda's spray, but that doesn't stop him from letting his emotions get the best of him.

Title: The Forbidden Necklace
Author: Deadly Chakram
Summary: He told her to never wear the necklace.

Title: Borrowed Happiness
Author: Deadly Chakram
Summary: Nothing ever seems to last the way it should.

Title: Restraint
Author: Blueowl
Summary: A 'Pheromone, My Lovely' what if. What if Superman had been affected by the concentrated spray? What will Lois do when he comes to her? Granted, no matter what she does, she'll get a lot more than she bargained for.

Title: Yours to Discover (for Queen of the Capes)
Author: KSaraSara
Summary: Clark drags a reluctant Lois along to Canada for a journalism conference. Before they go, Clark works up the courage to ask Lois out on a first date while in Canada and she says yes! When Lois has a sudden change of heart about attending the conference, Clark assumes it’s because of their date. But what if Lois has a secret of her own?

Title: Aftershocks
Author: Toomi8
Summary: Set during 'House of Luthor,' beginning  as the wedding is stopped/interrupted, and Clark escapes the Kryptonite cage, this story takes a different turn.
